body.p: Which of the following best describes the role of a domain name?

multiple_choice.choice: Define the supervisory computer on a LAN.
Define a shorthand name for an IP address.
Define a shorthand name for certain files.
Define the preferred network route for packets.

response.feedback: A domain name is not about roles on a LAN.
A domain name provides a shorthand name for an IP address.
A domain name is a name for something other than a file.
A domain name is not about routing.
